content.raw:
whenever i try to install gazebo from source i am getting an issue when i am running make -j4 on the gazebo repository,
prior to this i have installed all the prerequisites and i have created a build directory and run cmake with no errors. 
i then go to run make -j4 and at about 45% of the way through an error is called that sais that a definition class Vector3D inside of a namespace is invalid because Vector3D is a typedef.
this is all to do with ogre
if anyone has any knowledge of this is would be very usefull.
content.html: whenever i try to install gazebo from source i am getting an issue when i am running make -j4 on the gazebo repository, prior to this i have installed all the prerequisites and i have created a build directory and run cmake with no errors. i then go to run make -j4 and at about 45% of the way through an error is called that sais that a definition class Vector3D inside of a namespace is invalid because Vector3D is a typedef. this is all to do with ogre if anyone has any knowledge of this is would be very usefull.
